faq.question: Producing Screenshots
faq.answer: You can save the game screen by pressing the PrintScreen key. Screenshots will be saved in the Screenshot subfolder inside the Aion game folder.

faq.question: Chat Window Options
faq.answer: Chat windows are divided into All, Chat, Combat, and Group windows. You can adjust them according to your play style by using the Chat Window Option. Access the Add Tab, Delete Tab, Change Tab Name, and Tab Option menu by placing your mouse over the Chat Window tab, then right-clicking it.

faq.question: Game System Options
faq.answer: To change Game System Options, click System Menu in the lower right corner of the screen, then click System Options to display the System Options window. System Options is divided into Game Options, Graphic Options, Sound Options, and Key Mapping tabs.

faq.question: About Recovery
faq.answer: Aion is currently providing the Aion Exclusive Preview service, and our first priority is to fix bugs in the game and improve the system. Therefore, we cannot help you with matters related to recovery of items and characters.
